name: Aparte (vilscuderia)
description:
This game, this story is about a lonely dog Té, who wants to find his girlfriend Jé! 

There are 4 files: 

 - The story version: The lonely dog Té wants to find his girlfriend Jé (the story is unfinished). 

- There are 2 free roaming files: the big and the small file; 

The small file is the first and original game (made it for a game jam), the big file is perfected. 

 - Mutual Friend is a animation (not a game) of how Té met his girlfriend Jé (1:56 min).
